base_name: Prime Jumbo Released Interest Only Product Overlays
extracted_text: 11/16/25, 1:34 AM Prime Jumbo Released Interest Only Product Overlays Prime Jumbo Released Interest Only Product Overlays BORROWER GUIDELINE OVERLAY Only borrowers with a valid social security number are Eligible Borrowers allowed. Feedback Maximum Borrowers There can be no more than four borrowers per loan. UWM will service a maximum of ten loans per borrower at Maximum Loans any one point in time. ELIGIBILITY GUIDELINE OVERLAY AUS Feedback This product can be run only through DU. This product will have DU Approve/Ineligible feedback. The only reason allowed for ineligible feedback is the loan amount. https://thesource.uwm.com/search-guidelines/uwm-documents/underwriting/primejumboreleasedinterestonlyproductoverlays 1/5 11/16/25, 1:34 AM Prime Jumbo Released Interest Only Product Overlays ELIGIBILITY GUIDELINE OVERLAY A-Caution, Incomplete, Invalid, or Out of Scope are not allowed. No manual underwriting. Texas 50(a)(6) and Conversion Loans Texas 50(a)(6) loans are not eligible. In addition to purposes permitted by Fannie Mae guidelines, proceeds from a rate and term refinance may be used to pay off subordinated mortgage liens that have been seasoned for at least one year. The seasoning requirement for a junior lien that is a Rate and Term Refinance HELOC will be applied to the date of the most recent draw against the equity line unless the draws were less than $2,000 and Feedback provided that the total draws have not exceeded a total of $2,000 in the last twelve months. CREDIT OVERLAY DTI Cannot exceed 50%. Using extenuating circumstances to reduce waiting period Extenuating Circumstances requirements is not allowed (for Foreclosure, Bankruptcy, Deed-in-Lieu, Pre-Foreclosure/Short Sale). No late payments are allowed for any mortgage in the 12 Mortgage History months prior to loan closing unless during a COVID-19 forbearance. https://thesource.uwm.com/search-guidelines/uwm-documents/underwriting/primejumboreleasedinterestonlyproductoverlays 2/5 11/16/25, 1:34 AM Prime Jumbo Released Interest Only Product Overlays INCOME/EMPLOYMENT OVERLAY Tax returns or 1099s cannot be used as standalone Social Security Income documentation. Award letter or proof of current receipt is required. Alimony/Child Support Income Evidence of 6 months receipt required. A VOE is not acceptable as standalone documentation, VOEs unless ordered by UWM. A paystub or the equivalent is otherwise required. Assets as Income Assets as income is not allowed on this product type. RSU Income/Employer Stock Options are eligible to use towards qualifying income. Documentation RSU Income/Stock Options requirements would follow the most recent version of Feedback the Fannie Mae selling guide, as determined by AUS. Mortgage Credit Certificates Mortgage credit certificates are not permitted. PROPERTY GUIDELINE OVERLAY Co-ops, Leasehold Properties, Manufactured Homes, Ineligible Properties Agricultural Properties, Log Homes New attached projects in Florida must be on FNMA approved Florida Attached Condos list. Refinance of Listed Properties Must remove listing prior to clear to close. HPML HPML loans are not permitted. https://thesource.uwm.com/search-guidelines/uwm-documents/underwriting/primejumboreleasedinterestonlyproductoverlays 3/5 11/16/25, 1:34 AM Prime Jumbo Released Interest Only Product Overlays PROPERTY GUIDELINE OVERLAY Appraisal Waivers are not acceptable. All files must have a full appraisal. Refinance transactions with loan amounts greater than $2 million and above require a second appraisal and must be completed by a different appraiser. Appraised value will be the lower of the two appraisals. A secondary valuation is required on all loans. This valuation cannot be more than 10% less than the appraisal. Acceptable options include: Appraisal An acceptable CU/LCA score (completed by UWM) A UWM obtained AVM Feedback A collateral desktop analysis (CDA) An exterior-only appraisal A field review A second full appraisal Appraisals transferred from another lender to UWM are permitted if a transfer letter is obtained; the AMC’s AIR policy, E&O insurance, and QC plan are adequate, and the appraisal is found acceptable without revisions. Homeowner’s Insurance Coverage - Replacement Cost Investor guidelines require the dwelling coverage to cover the replacement cost, if the replacement cost is less than the loan amount. If the replacement cost is more than the loan amount, the dwelling coverage must cover the greater of 80% of the replacement cost or the loan amount. Full replacement https://thesource.uwm.com/search-guidelines/uwm-documents/underwriting/primejumboreleasedinterestonlyproductoverlays 4/5 11/16/25, 1:34 AM Prime Jumbo Released Interest Only Product Overlays PROPERTY GUIDELINE OVERLAY cost, guaranteed replacement cost, or 100% replacement cost verbiage is not acceptable. Escrow Holdbacks Not permitted. ASSETS GUIDELINE OVERLAY Reserve requirements are based on specific parameters of Reserves the loan. See the Prime Jumbo Released Interest Only Matrix for more details. DATE UPDATED: 10/23/2025 Feedback PROPRIETARY AND CONFIDENTIAL TO UWM - FOR USE BY UWM APPROVED PARTIES ONLY.
